A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I take it all back\, George Lucas. The prequels are better. I would rather sit through a Jar Jar Binks movie than watch this steaming pile of crap again.\n\nThe editing of the movie is horrible. It felt like 15 different movies spliced together. Many times I thought the film was drawing to an end only to have it NOT end. CGI is wonky and took me out of the film several times. Such a shame because ILM's work is usually top-notch.
